mapper.select: select r.app_name,count(r.app_id) as send_num from (select app_id,app_name,result,delay,transmit_time,is_deleted from sms_info UNION ALL select app_id,app_name,result,delay,transmit_time,is_deleted from application_info UNION ALL select app_id,app_name,result,delay,transmit_time,is_deleted from mail_info UNION ALL select app_id,app_name,result,delay,transmit_time,is_deleted from wechat_info) as r where r.is_deleted=0 and r.transmit_time >= #{startTime} and #{endTime} >= r.transmit_time group by r.app_id

select r.type,sum(case when r.id is not null and r.transmit_time >= #{startTime} and #{endTime} >= r.transmit_time then 1 end) as total, sum(case when r.result=0 and r.transmit_time >= #{startTime} and #{endTime} >= r.transmit_time then 1 end) as success_num from (select '短信推送' as type,id,result,transmit_time,is_deleted from sms_info UNION ALL select 'App推送' as type,id,result,transmit_time,is_deleted from application_info UNION ALL select '邮件推送' as type,id,result,transmit_time,is_deleted from mail_info UNION ALL select '公众号推送' as type,id,result,transmit_time,is_deleted from wechat_info) as r where r.is_deleted=0 group by r.type

select r.transmit_time,count(r.id) as fail_num from (SELECT id,result,date(transmit_time) as transmit_time,is_deleted from sms_info UNION ALL SELECT id,result,date(transmit_time) as transmit_time,is_deleted from application_info UNION ALL SELECT id,result,date(transmit_time) as transmit_time,is_deleted from mail_info UNION ALL SELECT id,result,date(transmit_time) as transmit_time,is_deleted from wechat_info UNION ALL SELECT null as id,1 as result,date_sub(date(#{endTime}), interval 0 day) as transmit_time,0 as is_deleted UNION ALL SELECT null as id,1 as result,date_sub(date(#{endTime}), interval 1 day) as transmit_time,0 as is_deleted UNION ALL SELECT null as id,1 as result,date_sub(date(#{endTime}), interval 2 day) as transmit_time,0 as is_deleted UNION ALL SELECT null as id,1 as result,date_sub(date(#{endTime}), interval 3 day) as transmit_time,0 as is_deleted UNION ALL SELECT null as id,1 as result,date_sub(date(#{endTime}), interval 4 day) as transmit_time,0 as is_deleted UNION ALL SELECT null as id,1 as result,date_sub(date(#{endTime}), interval 5 day) as transmit_time,0 as is_deleted UNION ALL SELECT null as id,1 as result,date_sub(date(#{endTime}), interval 6 day) as transmit_time,0 as is_deleted) as r where r.is_deleted=0 and r.result=1 and r.transmit_time >= date(#{startTime}) and date(#{endTime}) >= r.transmit_time group by r.transmit_time

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT( 0 ) smsDaily FROM sms_info ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT( 0 ) appDaily FROM application_info WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{startDaily} AND #{endDaily} ) b ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT( 0 ) mailDaily FROM mail_info WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{startDaily} AND #{endDaily}) c ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT( 0 ) wechatDaily FROM wechat_info WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{startDaily} AND #{endDaily}) d ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( 0 ) smsWeekly FROM sms_info WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{startWeekly} AND #{endWeekly}) e ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT( 0 ) appWeekly FROM application_info WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{startWeekly} AND #{endWeekly}) f ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( 0 ) wechatWeekly FROM wechat_info WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{startWeekly} AND #{endWeekly}) g ON 1 = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count( 0 ) mailWeekly FROM mail_info WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{startWeekly} AND #{endWeekly}) h ON 1 =1

SELECT AVG( delay ) delayAvg, DATE_FORMAT( concat( date( transmit_time ), ' ', HOUR ( transmit_time ), ':', floor( MINUTE ( transmit_time ) / 15 ) * 15 ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00' ) AS time FROM sms_info si WHERE transmit_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY DATE( time ), HOUR ( time ), MINUTE ( time )
